name: Keen Strider
description: Keen Strider is a long range DPS/support class equiped with a Bow. This class is agile and deals increased damage on enemy weakspots.The class has several attack, buff / debuff and support abilities. They can also use ground element skills to apply more effects to enemies.
quote: A technical class that specializes in party battles and excels at mid and long-range attacks and support.

basicSkills.name: Arrow Rush
basicSkills.description: Chain attack, which can be casted while moving. The last attack shoots multiple arrows.
